name: Mars Needs Gums
description:
What is Mars Needs Gums?

Team up with a friend or with yourself to help Bubba and Gamma build and maintain structures to protect the ship from Martian slimes! But here's the catch: When two players control both characters at the same time, both their speeds decrease by half!

What is it about?

Gamma and Bubba are two partners on a mission from the Gum Galaxy where people always stick together. Unfortunately, they have no choice but to land on the red planet while repairing their spacecraft. Gamma is an expert in building various structures while Bubba specializes in maintaining them from deteriorating in the harsh Martian storms. Of course, it does not take long until numerous individuals of Martian slimes are trying to invade their spaceship for their viscous resources! Help Gamma and Bubba protect the ship with the ultimate weapon in Gum Galaxy, a chewing-gum scraping shovel!
